about.title: About Us
about.mission: At Lighthouse Books, we believe that great stories know no borders. Our mission is to craft multilingual and bilingual editions for families around the world, fostering understanding and appreciation across cultures.
about.story: Lighthouse Books is a small, founder-led studio shaped by family life and a love of language. It began as a parent's project to make reading across languages feel natural and joyful. We create each title with care, blending storytelling, design, and modern creative workflows, then refine it through an editorial lens so every book feels intentional, warm, and welcoming.
